entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: A period of heavy rain. Amounts may approach warning criteria, or possibly exceed it in isolated areas. Thunderstorms possible. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate. Changes: Extended area to include southern Westland, and extended validity period.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Expect 125 to 135 mm of rain. Peak rates of 15 to 25 mm/h expected, especially in thunderstorms. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Minimal.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited
